fields.description:
Android O allows for accessing downloadable fonts and also defining fonts in XML. We should utilise support library 26.0 when implementing this.

https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/look-and-feel/downloadable-fonts.html
https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/look-and-feel/fonts-in-xml.html
